attributes.action: Allow the collection of store points when purchasing stage one infant formula.
attributes.additional_details: Stop the discrimination and formula shaming.
attributes.background: I believe this law should be changed so that families who can't or chose not to breastfeed their children are not being penalised.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584541
